name: Metro Communications Inc.
address: Metro Communications Inc., 3665 Kingsway #300, Vancouver, BC V5R 5W2

featured_reviews.review_id: Our company has been with Metro Communications for over 8 years now.  The Metro team has always been very quick to respond to any issues we may have with the phones or the system. Many times issues can be resolved remotely, but if an on-site service call is required they come out right away to get us back up and running. I would highly recommend Metro Communications!
featured_reviews.review_text: Our company has been with Metro Communications for over 8 years now.  The Metro team has always been very quick to respond to any issues we may have with the phones or the system. Many times issues can be resolved remotely, but if an on-site service call is required they come out right away to get us back up and running. I would highly recommend Metro Communications!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely thank you and assure your team at Impressions In Print, the very best of our service at all times!

featured_reviews.review_id: Upgraded our office phones with Metro Communications.  Shailesh  was super helpful in explaining our options, and functions we can implement.  Installation was a breeze.

featured_reviews.review_id: Have been working with Shailesh over the past 5 years, nothing but good things to say about him and the services of his company provides. I have referred his service to many of my clients, and everybody has been very happy over this long period of time. Highly recommended.

featured_reviews.review_id: We have been dealing with Metro Communications Inc for our phone services for many years now. They have always provide excellent support whenever needed. Their staff is skilled and professional and their service is very prompt. Great work Metro Communications!

featured_reviews.review_id: We've used MetroCentrex for over a decade, and its services have allowed us to connect staff and clients across four countries. Without the MetroCentrex communications technology, our travel agency could not assist clients from hundreds of cities. The costs are many times less than having multiple independent contracts with telephone companies. MetroCentrex consolidates everything using your existing computers and mobile devices. You have a single point of contact when new lines and services are needed anywhere in the world. Billing and services are consolidated, and requests are dealt with promptly. The MetroCentrex service is tailored to your specific needs. We started very small, and Metrocentrex allowed us to grow one line and country at a time. I can't recommend them more highly because there is always someone at MetroCentrex to help when needed.
